heroListBlock.title: We’re definitely going the same way, if you
list: You experience fear or anxiety and there is only negativity around (you don’t see any light coming out of surrounding darkness)
You don’t want to work or do something, but you have to. Don't get the life you imagined
You lose concentration, you try to cover everything at once, but you don’t get the desired result
You don’t understand what you want and whether these are your desires, you don’t know what to do next
You want to do something that brings pleasure and incom
You understand that the new day is similar to the previous one, you feel stuck in “groundhog day”

heroTitle.title: I will teach you to live in high spirits
heroTitle.subTitle: without emotional burnouts
heroTitle.supTitle: If you are emotionally burnt out and don’t enjoy your life

about.title: Let's get acquainted
about.caption: I know how you feel when:
text: Hi, I'm Yulia and my motto in life is to live a high life! I am always doing something that brings me pleasure, I love to discover new cities, countries, continents and I never stop doing it. For over 7 years I've been helping start-up companies develop and optimize their business.

My goal is to make this world a little better and increase the number of conscious happy people. That's why in 2021 I decided to dedicate myself to coaching and use all my experience to help those who are lost, do not see any prospects or do not know where to start.
Together we'll unlock your potential, take apart your desires and identify what's holding you back on the path to your goals. And you'll definitely find out what it's like to live high!
items: Everyone around seems to be more successful and happier
Forced to do things I don't like

withCoach.title: Why it's better with a coach
text: 'Myself' is a common mistake of people who push themselves and constantly face burnout...
Of course, you can do it yourself if you find the time and strength to study all the necessary information, understand what you need, what the problems are, and begin to act.
But time is short, and your current knowledge has led to your current situation.

Why 'reinvent the wheel', spend time, money and effort to go all the way on your own and not necessarily successfully? When you can ask for professional help and get a result faster and easier. That's what all successful people do!

importantResultsSection.title: What are your 6 most important results?
list: You’ll understand what you really want in life and start moving purposefully towards your desires
You’ll begin to live a conscious and full life paying attention to important things that you previously put off or ignored
You’ll gain courage and self-confidence, you’ll begin to do what you couldn’tt decide on before.
You’ll change your attitude towards yourself and the environment, you’ll find a positive attitude that will help you to reach a new level of life
You’ll increase your personal efficiency and energy level to move towards your goals
You’ll fill your life with pleasure and incredible accomplishments

inLive.title: Julia about the cardinal changes in your life
text: With a change in your inner state and a new view of your life, you will begin to see more possibilities, you will stop fussing and doubting. Life will take on a new trajectory. There's no room for burnout, because instead there's a pleasure that comes from literally taking every step. It's amazing how much we miss in life.
If you want to understand what's keeping you from living a life of pleasure while achieving your goals, I'd be more than happy to help you see how to do it
Think that in just a few months your life will play with bright colors and you will start to get incredible results.
Don't put your life on hold! People who live for pleasure achieve the best results! Want to know how?

beBetterToday.title: Be better today!
beBetterToday.subTitle: Your new life is waiting for you!
beBetterToday.textSupItems: The life in which you will
items: Live it up, do every day what brings pleasure
Fulfill your true dreams, desires and achieve what you have dreamed of for so long
Achieve cool personal results and transform your life beyond recognition
It will be easier to make decisions and get new impressions of yourself and your life
beBetterToday.textSubItems: Don't waste your time!!! Take a step right now!

modalRight.title: Hi! I'll be in touch with you soon!

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.text: I guarantee that having figured out with your “I want” and “I need”, “I can” and “I have no energy and time” and acting step by step according to the plan, your new life with pleasure will simply be inevitable

myFormula.title: My formula is very simple and effective
